entry.title: Thursday: Periods of drizzle. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this morning. 30 percent chance of drizzle late this afternoon. Fog patches developing late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light this afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:44 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
